scripts.bundle:lsw: npm run bundle:lsw-framework && npm run bundle:lsw-app
scripts.up: npm run build:all && npm run push:all && bash up.sh
scripts.dev: npx nodemon -x 'npm run build' $(cat devfiles.txt | xargs -n1 echo -w)
scripts.build:all: mpp --fileval dev/injections/buildAndTest.js --list projects.list.js && npm run build:framework && npm run build:dist
scripts.build-only:all: mpp --fileval dev/injections/build.js --list projects.list.js && npm run build:framework && npm run build:dist
